#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,j,arr[501];
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        i=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>arr[i];
        }
        sort(arr,arr+n,greater<int>());
        j=n-1;
        for(i=0,j;i<=j;i++,j--)
        {
            if(i==j)
                cout<<arr[i];
            else
            cout<<arr[i]<<" "<<arr[j]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<"\n";

    }
return 0;
}
